name: Slow-Roasted Corn On the Cob
keywords: butter, corn on the cob, lime juice, side dish, summer, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 12 ears of corn, silk removed, husks intact

recipeInstructions.text: Process the butter, pepper sauce and lime juice in a food processor until combined. Transfer to a piece of wax paper, roll into a log about 1 inch in diameter and chill in the freezer.

Gently peel back the leaves of each ear of corn. Slice the butter mixture in i-inch-thick slices. Rub each ear with 1 slice of the butter. Pull the husks back up, tie with butcher's twine and grill over a low charcoal fire for about 30 minutes.
